```markdown
| 产品名称   | 首发年份 | 容量     | 容量对应售价（美元） | 核心新增技术 / 功能           |
|------------|----------|----------|----------------------|------------------------------|
| iPhone     | 2007     | 4GB      | $499                 | 第一款多点触控智能手机；App Store |
| iPhone 3G  | 2008     | 8GB/16GB/32GB | $199/299/399 | 更快的互联网，GPS，蓝牙2.0 |
| iPhone 3GS | 2009     | 8GB/16GB/32GB | $199/299/399 | 3.0摄像头，FaceTime |
| iPhone 4   | 2010     | 16GB/32GB/64GB | $199/299/399 | Retina显示屏，8MP摄像头，前置摄像头 |
| iPhone 4S  | 2011     | 16GB/32GB/64GB | $199/299/399 | Siri，8MP摄像头，1080p视频录制 |
| iPhone 5   | 2012     | 16GB/32GB/64GB/128GB | $199/269/369/499 | 更大的4英寸显示屏，A6芯片 |
| iPhone 5S  | 2013     | 16GB/32GB/64GB/128GB | $199/269/369/499 | 64位A7芯片，Touch ID |
| iPhone 6/6 Plus | 2014 | 16GB/64GB/128GB | $199/269/369 | 更大的屏幕，防水防尘 |
| iPhone 6S/6S Plus | 2015 | 16GB/64GB/128GB/256GB | $299/399/499/599 | 改进的相机，3D Touch |
| iPhone 7/7 Plus | 2016 | 32GB/128GB/256GB | $399/499/599 | 防水防尘，Lightning端口 |
| iPhone 8/8 Plus | 2017 | 64GB/256GB | $499/649 | A11仿生芯片，Face ID |
| iPhone X | 2017 | 64GB/256GB | $999 | OLED显示屏，Face ID，Animoji |
| iPhone XR | 2018 | 64GB/128GB/256GB | $749/849/949 | 原彩显示屏，Face ID，A12仿生芯片 |
| iPhone XS/XS Max | 2018 | 64GB/256GB/512GB | $999/1,099/1,199 | 超视网膜XDR显示屏，A12仿生芯片 |
| iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max | 2019 | 64GB/128GB/256GB/512GB | $699/849/999 | A13仿生芯片，超广角摄像头 |
| iPhone SE | 2020 | 64GB/128GB/256GB | $399/429/469 | A13仿生芯片，4.7英寸显示屏 |
| iPhone 12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max | 2020 | 64GB/128GB/256GB/512GB | $799/849/1,049/1,199 | 5G能力，陶瓷盾，OLED显示屏 |
| iPhone 13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro Max | 2021 | 128GB/256GB/512GB/1TB | $799/849/1,099/1,299 | A15仿生芯片，ProRes视频录制 |
| iPhone 14/14 Plus/14 Pro/14 Pro Max | 2022 | 128GB/256GB/512GB/1TB | $799/899/1,099/1,199 | 始终在线显示，A16仿生芯片 |
```
